name: Deeply Tangled
description:
In this Zen game, you play as a forest trying to inhibit its roots.

Find hidden water veins, to grow taller but beware - each root old is an obstacle for the roots yet to come.

This game was made for #GlobalGameJam2023, in less than 24 hours, by 
Kingblade: https://twitter.com/kingbladeDev
Ulraf: https://twitter.com/_Ulraf_

We hope you'll take your time, chill and enjoy!
